keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tax cuts for workers and savers. Deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, new businesses. Strong against a 'Coalition of Chaos' that would lead to more debt, higher taxes, and jobs lost.

issues.economy: A better future for you, your family and Britain.
issues.governance: Competent leadership with the Conservatives versus the 'Coalition of Chaos'.

leaflet.personalStatement: My priorities for our area include: 1) I will always put the interests of my country and constituents first. Your interests above self interest. 2) I believe in smaller government and lower taxes so people can keep more of the money they earn. 3) I want to see the people of Bury, Ramsbottom and Tottington get the best deal.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contrasts David Nuttall and the Conservative Party's leadership and policies with the potential consequences of a Labour-led 'Coalition of Chaos'.
